synopsis: 14 years have passed since the demon bear named Akakabuto terrorized humans and dogs alike in the Ohu mountains. He was defeated by the Tora-ge Akita Gin in Ohu's Futago Pass using the Battouga. The peace that has reigned in Ohu since then is shattered when a monster begins to ravage the stronghold. This forces Gin's mate Sakura, pregnant with Gin's pups, and a veteran from the final battle with Akakabuto, Smith, to flee Futago Pass. Six months after, Sakura is deathly ill, and her son is taking care of her. While out hunting for his mother, the six month old meets GB, a cowardly English Setter. He later tries to save GB and GB's friend Sasuke from a guard dog, but has to be rescued by Smith. Leading Smith to his mother, the puppy finds Sakura on her death-bed. As she dies, Sakura tells Smith to bring her son to Ohu to meet his father. Named Weed by GB, the young son of Gin begins the long journey to the Ohu mountains.

After 14 years of peace in the Ohu Mountains, a strange, horrible monster invaded and overtook Gajou, the dog paradise. During the battle, the leader Gin sent his mate, Sakura, off with one of his commanders, Smith, to keep their unborn pups safe.

Six months later, a young Akita pup that looks just like Gin met GB, an English setter and a slave of a rogue boss dog named Nero. The pup tried to save one of GB's friends from a farm's guard dog, but all three ultimately are saved by Smith, who now has lost his right foreleg. Smith recognizes the pup and is led to Sakura, who is deathly ill. Soon after Smith's arrival, Sakura dies. With his father missing and his mother dead, GB and Smith take the pup in; GB names the pup Weed, due to his tenacious spirit.

The group has several adventures on their way back to the Ohu Mountains, and find more allies as they battle and defeat the monster and rescue Gin.

title.jp: The War of Futago Pass Begins

synopsis:
After 14 years of peace in the Ohu Mountains, a strange, horrible monster invaded and overtook Gajou, the dog paradise. During the battle, the leader Gin sent his mate, Sakura, off with one of his commanders, Smith, to keep their unborn pups safe.

Six months later, a young Akita pup that looks just like Gin met GB, an English setter and a slave of a rogue boss dog named Nero. The pup tried to save one of GB's friends from a farm's guard dog, but all three ultimately are saved by Smith, who now has lost his right foreleg. Smith recognizes the pup and is led to Sakura, who is deathly ill. Soon after Smith's arrival, Sakura dies. With his father missing and his mother dead, GB and Smith take the pup in; GB names the pup Weed, due to his tenacious spirit.

The group has several adventures on their way back to the Ohu Mountains, and find more allies as they battle and defeat the monster and rescue Gin.

Smith recognizes the pup and is led to Sakura, who is deathly ill. Soon after Smith's arrival, Sakura dies. With his father missing and his mother dead, GB and Smith take the pup in; GB names the pup Weed, due to his tenacious spirit.

The group has several adventures on their way back to the Ohu Mountains, and find more allies as they battle and defeat the monster and rescue Gin.
